title: Dawn Butler – 2021 Comments on the Conduct of Kemi Badenoch
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Dawn Butler, the Labour MP for Brent Central, on 29 January 2021.
content: Nadine Writes asked a simple question all you had to do was answer her. Now she’s been subjected to vile abuse.
You have set some nasty people onto a young journalist who is currently grieving a family member. MPs need to be understanding of the impact they have.
